com.cerner.beadledom.health.internal

Class HealthChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cerner.beadledom.health.internal.HealthChecker

  • public class HealthChecker
extends Object
    Implements the logic for the primary health check, diagnostic health check, dependency listing, and dependency availability checks.

    Health checks are performed by invoking the checkAvailability method of the injected HealthDependency instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HealthDependencyDto doDependencyAvailabilityCheck(String name)
      Returns information about a dependency, including the result of checking its health.
      List<HealthDependencyDto> doDependencyListing()
      Returns a list of all health dependencies, but does not check their health.
      HealthDto doDiagnosticHealthCheck()
      Performs the Diagnostic Health Check.
      HealthDto doPrimaryHealthCheck()
      Performs the Primary Health Check.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • doPrimaryHealthCheck

        public HealthDto doPrimaryHealthCheck()
        Performs the Primary Health Check.

        The resulting DTO will contain information about the health of all the main dependencies (currently, all dependencies) as well as an overall status of either 200 (if all dependencies are healthy) or 503 (if one or more dependencies are unhealthy) and corresponding message. Other metadata fields on the HealthDto will also be populated.

      • doDiagnosticHealthCheck

        public HealthDto doDiagnosticHealthCheck()
        Performs the Diagnostic Health Check.

        Currently the same as the Primary Health Check.

      • doDependencyListing

        public List<HealthDependencyDto> doDependencyListing()
        Returns a list of all health dependencies, but does not check their health.

      • doDependencyAvailabilityCheck

        public HealthDependencyDto doDependencyAvailabilityCheck(String name)
        Returns information about a dependency, including the result of checking its health.
